name: Burangiri

skills.name: Battering Skull
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.
skills.notes: Useful for Magma Dragon and control.

skills.name: Bakemono Charge
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 40% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
skills.notes: AOE stun is useful for control, but chance is not 100%.

skills.name: Frightful Warcry
skills.description: Places a 25% [Strengthen] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Also places a [Shield] buff for 2 turns on all allies with less than 50% HP. The [Shield] buff is equal to 15% of the target’s MAX HP.

effects.notes: Shield for 2 turns on allies <50% HP, equal to 15% of their MAX HP.

skills.notes: Key for survivability in Bommal and Scarab King.

skills.name: Soulmonger
skills.description: Heals this Champion by 50% of their MAX HP whenever an ally or an enemy dies.

effects.notes: Heals 50% MAX HP on any death (ally or enemy).

skills.notes: Enables soloing Bommal and Scarab King.

forms.aura: Increases Ally RESIST in all Battles by 40.
forms.comments: Burangiri is a specialist for Doom Tower Bommal and Scarab King. His passive and A3 make him a top solo option for these bosses. Less useful in general content.

general: PRIORITY OFFENSE T6: WARMASTER (A1 'Battering Skull' and A2 'Bakemono Charge' are single-hit DEF-scaling attacks - 60% proc per skill for 4% boss MAX HP / 6% dungeon boss MAX HP damage). Giant Slayer is INCORRECT for Burangiri (no multi-hit skills).

PRIORITY DEFENSE T6: Unshakeable (CRITICAL +50 RES - synergizes with 40 RES aura for 90 total, essential for Doom Tower Bommal/Scarab King debuff resistance). Delay Death (CRITICAL for solo survivability). Shadow Heal (CRITICAL - synergizes with passive 'Soulmonger' heal on death).

PRIORITY SUPPORT T6: Lay on Hands + Healing Savior (CRITICAL - boost passive heal from 50% MAX HP to higher values, essential for Doom Tower solo strategies). Lore of Steel (CRITICAL - Regeneration/Immortal set boost for sustain). Lasting Gifts (A3 Strengthen/Shield extension 2→3 turns).

KEY MASTERIES: Warmaster (A1/A2 DEF-scaling single-hit), Unshakeable (40 RES aura + 50 RES mastery = 90 total for Doom Tower), Tough Skin + Blastproof (reduce incoming damage/bombs for solo Bommal/Scarab King), Shadow Heal + Lay on Hands + Healing Savior (passive heal boost - 50% MAX HP on death), Lore of Steel (Regeneration/Immortal set boost), Resurgent (healing boost for solo).

SYNERGIES: Passive 'Soulmonger' heals 50% MAX HP whenever ANY champion dies (ally or enemy) - enables solo Bommal/Scarab King strategies by healing on minion deaths. A3 places Strengthen 25% on all allies + Shield (15% MAX HP) on allies <50% HP for 2 turns (4-turn CD booked, Lasting Gifts extends 2→3 turns). A2 places Stun (40% base, 60% booked) on all enemies. A1 places Provoke (20% base, 40% booked) on single target (useful for Magma Dragon control). Build for 60-70K HP, 3-4K DEF, 220-250 SPD, 200+ RES (with Unshakeable + 40 RES aura) for Doom Tower solo strategies.

DOOM TOWER SPECIALIST: Burangiri is a meta solution for Bommal the Dreadhorn and Scarab King (10/10 Doom Tower rating). Passive heals on minion deaths, A3 Strengthen reduces incoming damage, high RES (90+ with masteries/aura) resists debuffs. Regeneration set + Immortal + high HP/DEF/RES for sustain. Lay on Hands + Healing Savior boost passive heal for extreme sustain.

UNIQUE MECHANICS: Passive heals on ANY death (ally or enemy) - 50% MAX HP heal per death. Makes Burangiri one of the best solo champions for bosses with minions (Bommal, Scarab King). Less useful for content without frequent deaths (Clan Boss 5/10, Dungeons 7/10, Arena 6/10).

notes: Burangiri is a meta solution for Bommal and Scarab King in Doom Tower (10/10 rating). His passive 'Soulmonger' heals 50% MAX HP whenever any champion dies (ally or enemy), enabling solo strategies by healing on minion deaths. Build for high HP (60-70K), DEF (3-4K), SPD (220-250), and RES (200+ with Unshakeable + 40 RES aura = 90 total). Regeneration + Immortal sets + defensive/healing masteries for extreme sustain. Less impact in Clan Boss (5/10), Dungeons (7/10), and Arena (6/10) - specialized for Doom Tower boss strategies.
